00048 #define TEMPLATE_SET_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER "1.0"

00053 class XMLChConversion
00054 {
00055 private:
00057         XMLCh *str;
00058 
00062         void convert(int i)
00063         {
00064                 char cstr[64];
00065                 sprintf(cstr, "%d", i);
00066                 convert(cstr);
00067         }
00068 
00072         void convert(const char *const s)
00073         {
00074                 clear();
00075                 int n=(int)strlen(s);
00076                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00077                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00078                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00079                 str[n]=0;
00080         }
00081 
00085         void convert(const wchar_t *const s)
00086         {
00087                 clear();
00088                 int n=(int)wcslen(s);
00089                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00090                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00091                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00092                 str[n]=0;
00093         }
00094 
00096         void clear()
00097         {
00098                 if (str)
00099                         delete[] str;
00100                 str = NULL;
00101         }
00102 public:
00106         XMLChConversion(int i) { str=NULL; convert(i); }
00110         XMLChConversion(const wchar_t *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00114         XMLChConversion(std::wstring s) { str=NULL; convert( s.c_str() ); }
00118         XMLChConversion(const char *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00122         XMLChConversion(std::string s) { str=NULL; convert(s.c_str()); }
00124         ~XMLChConversion() { clear(); }
00128         const XMLCh *String() const { return str; }
00129 };
00130 
00132 #define ToXMLCh(s) ( XMLChConversion(s).String() )

00135 /*
00136  * Create the template element. This is the top level parent element.
00137  */
00138 DOMElement* CreateTemplateElement(TemplateData &templateData, DOMDocument* doc, const AffymetrixGuidType &dataTypeIdentifier)
00139 {
00140         // ArrayFile element
00141         DOMElement* arrayElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ELEMENT));
00142         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER));
00143         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ELEMENT_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_SET_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER));
00144         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ELEMENT_ID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(templateData.TemplateFileIdentifier()));
00145         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATE_DATE_TIME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(templateData.CreationDateTime()));
00146         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATED_BY_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(templateData.CreatedBy()));
00147         return arrayElement;
00148 }
00149 
00150 /*
00151  * Add the user attributes to the document if they exist.
00152  */
00153 void AddUserAttributes(TemplateData &templateData, DOMDocument* doc, DOMElement* arrayElement)
00154 {
00155         int nUserAttributes = (int) templateData.UserAttributes().size();
00156         if (nUserAttributes > 0)
00157         {
00158                 DOMElement* userAttributesElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ELEMENT));
00159 
00160                 affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator paramIt;
00161                 for (paramIt=templateData.UserAttributes().begin(); paramIt!=templateData.UserAttributes().end(); ++ paramIt)
00162                 {
00163                         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType &param = *paramIt;
00164                         DOMElement* paramElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT));
00165                         paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.GetName()));
00166                         paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(
00167                                 ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ParameterValueTypeToString(param.ValueType())));
00168                         if (param.RequiredFlag() == true)
00169                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh("Yes"));
00170                         if (param.HasDefault() == true)
00171                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_DEFAULT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.DefaultToString()));
00172 
00173                         if (param.ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType)
00174                         {
00175                                 std::list<std::wstring>::iterator valIt;
00176                                 for (valIt = param.ControlMultiValues().begin(); valIt != param.ControlMultiValues().end(); ++valIt)
00177                                 {
00178                                         DOMElement *valueElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ELEMENT));
00179                                         valueElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(*valIt));
00180                                         paramElement->appendChild(valueElement);
00181                                 }
00182                         }
00183                         else
00184                         {
00185                                 DOMElement *valueElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ELEMENT));
00186                                 valueElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(param.DefaultToString()));
00187                                 paramElement->appendChild(valueElement);
00188                         }
00189 
00190                         int nControl = (int) param.ControlledVocabulary().size();
00191                         if (nControl > 0)
00192                         {
00193                                 std::list<std::wstring>::iterator controlIt;
00194                                 for (controlIt=param.ControlledVocabulary().begin(); controlIt!=param.ControlledVocabulary().end(); ++controlIt)
00195                                 {
00196                                         DOMElement* controlElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_CONTROL_ELEMENT));
00197                                         controlElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_CONTROL_ELEMENT_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(*controlIt));
00198                                         paramElement->appendChild(controlElement);
00199                                 }
00200                         }
00201                         userAttributesElement->appendChild(paramElement);
00202                 }
00203                 arrayElement->appendChild(userAttributesElement);
00204         }
00205 }

00222 /*
00223  * Write the entire file, the header and body.
00224  */
00225 bool TemplateFileWriter::Write(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_template::TemplateData &templateData)
00226 {
00227         // Initialize the XML4C2 system.
00228         try
00229         {
00230                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00231         }
00232         catch (const XMLException&)
00233         {
00234                 return false;
00235         }
00236 
00237         // Create a DOM implementation object and create the document type for it.
00238         DOMImplementation *impl = DOMImplementationRegistry::getDOMImplementation(ToXMLCh(L"LS"));
00239         //DOMDocumentType* dt  = impl->createDocumentType(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ELEMENT), 0, ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_DTD));
00240         DOMDocument* doc = impl->createDocument();
00241         doc->setStandalone(true);
00242         //doc->appendChild(dt);
00243 
00244         // Create the serializer.
00245         DOMWriter *theSerializer = ((DOMImplementationLS*)impl)->createDOMWriter();
00246         theSerializer->setEncoding(ToXMLCh(TEMPLATE_FILE_ENCODING));
00247 
00248         // TemplateFile element
00249         DOMElement* templateElement = CreateTemplateElement(templateData, doc, dataTypeIdentifier);
00250 
00251         // UserAttributes element
00252         AddUserAttributes(templateData, doc, templateElement);
00253 
00254         // Add the template element to the document.
00255         doc->appendChild(templateElement);
00256 
00257         // Write the file.
00258         bool status = false;
00259         XMLFormatTarget *myFormTarget = new LocalFileFormatTarget(fileName.c_str());
00260         try
00261         {
00262                 theSerializer->writeNode(myFormTarget, *doc);
00263                 status = true;
00264         }
00265         catch (...)
00266         {
00267                 status = false;
00268         }
00269 
00270         // Clean up
00271         doc->release();
00272         theSerializer->release();
00273         delete myFormTarget;
00274 
00275         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00276 
00277         return status;
00278 }
